entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:11 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
